name: Lucky Whales
description:
Player's controls: 

- Movement : WASD

- Jump: SPACE BAR

- Shoot: LEFT TRIGGER

- Reset after dying: R

- Pause menù: ESC.

The game has two different paths that the player can choose while advancing in to the four available levels : 

- GREEN PATH = EASY 

- ORANGE PATH = HARD 

The harder you go, the more points you will be able to collect.

Enjoy the challenge!!!
